Olympusphere Photo Contest

Olympus Singapore has launched Olympusphere, an online photo community for Olympus users to share, learn and interact. Start showcasing your photos today and earn points to enjoy exciting benefits.

item.title: 60million websites are powered by WordPress
item.description:
60million websites are powered by WordPress

,

Those who has used or still using WordPress,

,

Not only you have to manually update WordPress there are plugins you download and paid may end up with compatible issues.
The "Freeloaders"
freeloadera are people who installed Cracked / nulled version.
Kudos to you for falling as a victim of hackers collecting sensitive data like your password login.
You might not care now.
When the time comes. ____________ fill in the blanks =)
What was WP did? They open a an sucrplious
WordPressdotcom has "solved" at the same time turning into a profitable company if you host via WordPressdotcom.
WordPressdotcom has a free plan that has a
pathetic 500mb storage with their free subdomain yoursite.WordPressdotcom .
If you are going to upload media, like a photographer. You will end up pulling your hair.WordPressdotcom charges an unscrupulous amount should you decided to have your down own yoursitedotcom mapped even if you are using their pathetic 500mb storage
What was WordPress.org Solution
Jetpack Plugin.
If you are using self-hosted W ordPress.org you have the option to connect to WordPressdotcom using Jetpack Plugin ( free and paid version) to sync betweenWordPressdotcom and WordPress.org to auto update.
It still doesn't make sense , it is more expensive as the free version of the plugin still, have limitations . Plus when it does auto updates, your other plugins may not be compatible, you still have to manually update it.
Know the differenceWordPressdotcom - A profitable and controlled hosted by WordPress.
There is a free version but it iss limited to yoursite.WordPressdotcom(If you are starting an e-commerce site using WordPressdotcom you end up regretting as you can never upload plugin or templates, you end pulling your hair, again)
WordPress.org - A nonprofit open source , Self hosted. You maintain it , it is your responsibility,
(If you are starting an e-commerce site using WordPress you end up spending more than what you can profit , you end pulling your hair again, again)
I will bluntly say it’s a love hate relationship, I have used WordPress, self hosted spending 600dlrs, It was the trend , it was simple to use. But one simply cannot keep updating their site and pay and pay such for the rest of their life.

,

"Don't worry I got this , I can use search engine my way through”
Typically anyone will do , looking for an answer via the search engines and start typing "best way not to pull your hair when using WordPress” – I'm kidding.
What I meant is you definitely will go on and search what is the best solution or so smart to find free hosting to host WordPress - I will cover why free hosting should not used for production
Honestly , your search will return with junks of sites that just wants to earn $Quoting you should use this host and that host to WordPress.
You end up paying expensive templates to deliver the best results .Because the templates say " SEO FRIENDLY”
I have seen advertised temaplates " SEO optimised”-SEO stand for Search Engine Optimisation , Did the author genuinely knows he/she is repeating the same word Optimization Optimised
Google has changed its SEO algorithm recently and has always been changing. No one knows for sure what had changed.There are other ways than SEO to have your presence on the web
Current WordPress Sites,

,
  • If you currently have a company uses WordPress and your company is making enough to sustain.
  • If you want a free test to check if you WordPress sites is vulnerable or need a boost.
  • I am able to provide you an outstanding solution to supercharged your WordPress, boosting fast blazing speed 100% uptime guaranteed with your money back guaranteed.
  • Not Free Not Cheap
,

The key for a better WordPress goes back to the source of the technology powering it. NOT the template or plugin, that is secondary.
Current Start-Ups or plan to start up

,
  • If you would like to have unlimited everything for the rest of your life for free
  • If you would like to have your site powered by the world's most powerful organization
  • If you like to know how to make your presence on the web without the hassle of SEO
,

Question: Since you ditch WordPress, how are you suppose to know anything or if they get better or how can you supercharged WordPress Sites as you mentioned.
I am self-hosting WordPress locally on my machine , isolated from the world wide web and do live testing on the web to see results. I read news feed via the dashboard when updates are pushed in.
Question: Why are you not using WordPress?
The constant updates, it is just too much. The current version of WordPress is 4.x,x

,

There are 3 decimals , can you imagine how many updates has been pushed. Bug fixes time over time
Time has changed , the change is now
